statements: UPDATE sustainable_materials SET material_used = 'Recycled Plastic' WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE sustainable_materials SET sustainability_rating = 5, product_name = 'Organic Cotton T-Shirt' WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE sustainable_materials SET material_used='Bamboo', sustainability_rating=5 WHERE product_id=1;
UPDATE sustainable_materials SET sustainability_rating=4, material_used='Recycled Plastic' WHERE product_id=2;
UPDATE products SET product_name = 'Organic Shirt', environmentally_friendly = TRUE WHERE product_id = 100;
UPDATE sustainability_standards SET criteria = 'Renewable materials', description = 'Focus on using materials that are sourced sustainably' WHERE standard_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET product_name = 'Organic Cotton T-Shirt', environmentally_friendly = TRUE WHERE product_id = 123;

UPDATE sustainability_standards SET description = 'Ensures sustainable sourcing of materials and production processes', criteria = 'Recyclable, biodegradable', standard_name = 'Eco-Friendly Certification' WHERE standard_id = 5;
UPDATE products SET material='Wood' WHERE product_id=1;
UPDATE materials SET sustainability_rating=5 WHERE material_id=2;
UPDATE products SET material = 'Cotton' WHERE product_id = 1
UPDATE materials SET sustainability_rating = 5 WHERE material_id = 2
UPDATE materials SET material_description = 'Updated description' WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE customers SET customer_email = 'updated@example.com' WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE materials SET material_name = 'New Material Name' WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE product_reviews SET review_rating = 4, review_description = 'Updated review description' WHERE review_id = 3;
UPDATE Products SET name='Updated Product Name', description='Updated Product Description', material_id=2 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Materials SET name='New Material Name', sustainable=true WHERE id=3;
UPDATE Products SET description = 'Updated description for Product 1', material_id = 2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Materials SET sustainable = true, description = 'New sustainable material' WHERE id = 3;
